Name: Revolving Gauntlet
Desc:
Uses Gauntlet Revolver's built-in cannon to cause an additional explosion. Not a stand-alone skill. Can only be auto-cast or manually cast during certain Attack skills.
Charge via key-down to manually reload bullets. Charge can be used while using another skill, and up to 2 skills can be charged at once.
Revolving Gauntlet Auto-casting Skills: Magnum Drive, Double Drive
Revolving Gauntlet Manual-casting Skills: Revolving Bunker
